Detailed Description

Driver for ds18b20 one wire temperature sensor.

Author:
M. P. Hayes, UCECE
Date:
08 June 2002

bool ds18b20_device_p ( u1wire_obj_t *  dev  ) 

Return true if the one wire device is a ds18b20 temperature sensor.

Parameters:
dev pointer to one wire device
Returns:
1 if device is a dsb18b20 otherwise 0

int8_t ds18b20_temp_conversion_start ( u1wire_t  dev  ) 

Start a temperature conversion.

Parameters:
dev pointer to one wire device object
Returns:
1 if OK, 0 if no device responding, negative if error
Note:
The conversion takes 0.75 s for 12 bit resolution.

References DS18B20_CONVERT_T, and u1wire_command().

int8_t ds18b20_temp_read ( u1wire_t  dev,
ds18b20_temp_t *  ptemp 
)

Read last converted temperature.

Parameters:
dev pointer to one wire device
ptemp pointer for temperature result
Returns:
1 if OK, 0 if no device responding, negative if error
Note:
The temperature conversion must be complete.
